name: Miasma Caves
description: Miasma Caves is a pacifist roguelike game where you play as Lesath, a treasure hunter looking to appraise relics and revitalize her village in a procedurally generated cave system against the environment itself.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
